definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: The system's capability can be expanded to provide up to 30 kilowatts of AC power for use in the field.
sentences.chinese: 在野外，該系統最高可以提供30千瓦交流電源。

sentences.english: AC Dynamometer is the key equipment of the testbed.

sentences.english: Electricity in Britain is 240 volts, AC.
sentences.chinese: 英國的電壓是交流電240伏。

sentences.english: It also offers stainless steel shelves and a high-output commercial HVAC system.
sentences.chinese: 還包括了不鏽鋼架，高輸出的高壓交流電系統。

sentences.english: I try to use AC power, no battery.
sentences.chinese: 我嘗試使用交流電源，沒有電池。
尼古拉特斯拉發明了交流電。

sentences.english: Diodes are electronic devices which rectify alternating current to direct current.

sentences.english: A device used to change the voltage of an alternating current signal or to change the impedance of an alternating current circuit.
sentences.chinese: 一種用來改變交流信號電壓或交流電路阻抗的裝置。

sentences.english: The AC power supply and frame Configuration Performance, reliability.
sentences.chinese: 交流電源和框架配置，性能，可靠性。

sentences.english: The action to take when the laptop lid is closed and the laptop is on AC power. Valid values are "suspend", "hibernate" and "blank".
sentences.chinese: 當使用交流電而關閉筆記型電腦上蓋時要採取的動作。

sentences.english: It also features stainless steel shelves and a high-output HVAC system.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，還有不鏽鋼架，高輸出的高壓交流電系統。

sentences.english: If the system low-power mode should be enabled when on AC power.
sentences.chinese: 在交流電下應否啓用低耗電模式。

sentences.english: Rectifiers are devices that convert alternating current (AC) to direct current (DC).
sentences.chinese: 整流器是一種將交流電轉換爲直流電的儀器。

sentences.english: The design of the alternating bridge by amplifying the source with light insulates;

sentences.english: All other circuits may be controlled by AC.
sentences.chinese: 所有其他的電路可用交流電控制。
